channel.title: CVE Feed for XnView -- XnView
channel.description: The latest CVEs for XnView -- XnView

item.title: CVE-2013-3246|2024-08-06T16:00:10.106Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in xnview.exe in XnView before 2.03 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted image layer in an XCF file.

item.title: CVE-2013-3493|2024-08-06T16:14:56.455Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: XnView 2.03 has an integer overflow vulnerability

item.title: CVE-2013-3941|2024-08-06T16:30:48.222Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: Xjp2.dll in XnView before 2.13 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via (1) the Csiz parameter in a SIZ marker, which triggers an incorrect memory allocation, or (2) the lqcd field in a QCD marker in a crafted JPEG2000 file, which leads to a heap-based buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2013-3937|2024-08-06T16:30:48.910Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in xnview.exe in XnView before 2.13 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the biBitCount field in a BMP file.

item.title: CVE-2013-3939|2024-08-06T16:30:48.182Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: xnview.exe in XnView before 2.13 does not properly handle RLE strip lengths during processing of RGB files, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via the RLE strip size field in a RGB file, which leads to an unexpected sign extension error and a heap-based buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2013-3492|2024-08-06T16:14:55.806Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: XnView 2.03 has a stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability

item.title: CVE-2013-3247|2024-08-06T16:00:10.099Z -- xnview -- xnview
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in xnview.exe in XnView before 2.03 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted RLE compressed layer in an XCF file.
